snippet: Stocks pared steep gains after the Federal Reserve chairman, Ben S. Bernanke, offered few hints that further monetary stimulus was imminent.
abstract: Stocks pare steep gains after Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke offers few hints that further monetary stimulus is imminent.
lead_paragraph: Stocks pared steep gains after the Federal Reserve chairman, Ben S. Bernanke, offered few hints that further monetary stimulus was imminent.

headline.main: Shares Fade After Fed Does Not Show Its Hand
headline.print_headline: Shares Fade After Fed Does Not Show Its Hand
